hero.title: Luxury Living at 5WEST
hero.text: Character Homes Located in the Heart of Kerrisdale

intro.title: Combining Style, Comfort, and Nature
intro.text: This exclusive Kerrisdale development blends timeless elegance with modern sustainability, offering refined living with energy-efficient design and natural finishes.

design.subtitle: Design and Life Experience
design.title: A Home Like No Other
design.text: Step inside and experience luxury like never before. Every detail, from the sleek interiors to the carefully curated materials, has been chosen to create a home that is both beautiful and functional.

floorplans.subtitle: Floorplans
floorplans.title: Your Perfect Home is Waiting
floorplans.text: Browse our selection of thoughtfully designed residences, each offering a unique layout tailored to your lifestyle.
floorplans.text2: Discover thoughtfully designed 1, 2 & 3-bedroom floorplans, each crafted for maximum space, comfort, and style. From open-concept layouts to private balconies with stunning views, every detail is designed to enhance your lifestyle.

location.subtitle: Location and Lifestyle
location.title: The Amenities Speak For Themselves
location.text: Located in the heart of Kerrisdale, this community offers the perfect balance of serenity and city convenience. Stroll through charming boutique shops, cozy caf√©s, golf courses and lush parks, all just minutes away.

team.subtitle: Our Team
team.title: Built on Excellence, Backed by Trust
